document.full_text: utah has become the first u.s. state to name an official firearm, placing an automatic pistol on a list of designated symbols, right along with the honeybee and the cutthroat trout.
document.title: utah becomes first in u.s. to designate official state gun
lines_and_colors: utah has become the first u.s. state to name an official firearm, placing an automatic pistol on a list of designated symbols, right along with the honeybee and the cutthroat trout.
